ValidationRule.description: Lab Samples can only be changed (re-parented) to another case by a Manager. This should only happen when an error was made.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PRIORVALUE( Case__c) <> NULL, ISCHANGED( Case__c ), $Profile.Name != 'Lab Manager', $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lab Samples can only be re-assigned by a Lab Manager. Please ask your manager to do this for you.
